programme.title: Red Bull Romaniacs 2023 - Sibiu (ROU) - 150min LIVEmaniacs Summary
programme.desc: In this year’s anniversary edition, competitors from 55+ nations will be competing, among them the world’s best hard enduro riders like Manuel Lettenbichler (GER), Graham Jarvis (UK), Wade Young (RSA), Mario Roman (ESP), Michael Walkner (AUT).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: Across seven rivers, through mountains and forests, 12 strongmen go to toughest places to find out who is strongest Viking in the World and open a new season of Strongman champions league for 2015. Events like the Hercules Hold, Yoke Race and pulling a real Viking ship are some of the ingredients of this fantastic show.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of Strongman champions league will be hosted in Germany, by FIBO - the leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health worldwide with 300,000 visitors in four days. Special implements like the biggest log in the world or the special Bavarian stone lift are not only a challenge, but also an opportunity for new personal, national and world records.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 3, Holland
programme.desc: Holland is hosting 12 different countries with 14 of the strongest men in the world for the third stage of the Strongman Champions League.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 4, Finland
programme.desc: Zydrunas Savickas, one of strongest people on earth is in this competition which has attracted the attention of the audience in the battle for the title of strongest man in Finland. The next round of SCL is in Bulgaria.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 5, Bulgaria
programme.desc: The next stage of the competition is in Bulgaria where Ervin Katona (SCL World Champion 2012) will compete for the last time.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 6, Latvia
programme.desc: Krzysztof Radzikowski, the leader in the league will fight hard to keep Dainis Zageris off from the title and to gather another 25 ranking points in this next stage in Latvia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 7, Croatia
programme.desc: The competition sees a close battle with a new world record in overhead dumbbell and close finishes throughout the day. This stage is in Croatia, in a city over 1700 years old, steeped in Roman tradition and history, the athletes arrive for the truck pull after a picturesque boat ride on the Adriatic Sea.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 8, Poland
programme.desc: We are now half way through the SCL 2015 and getting closer to the grand world finals in Turkey. The eighth stage is in Poland, the home country of the current leader Krzysztof Radzikowski.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 9, Austria
programme.desc: In this stage we go into the mountains of Austria to find out through six grueling events who is the strongest in the land of Alps. Martin Wildauer, current World Champion 2014 and Austrian local is competing alongside Zageris, Radzikowski, Belsak and many others.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 10, Romania
programme.desc: The 10th stage of this year's competition in Strongman Champions League is held in the Romanian city of Sibiu where the 12 strongmen continue to compete for the title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 11, World Log Lift Championship
programme.desc: The 11th stage is the SCL Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. In this championship, each competitor must lift three different weights overhead. Zydrunas Savickas is the current world record holder in the Log Lift.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 12, Lithuania
programme.desc: This next episode of the Strongman Champions League is hosted in Lithuania and sees us getting one step closer to the final.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 13, Portugal
programme.desc: The 13th stage of Strongman Champions League is in Maia, Portugal. The competition is at the “Powerexpo” – one of the best sport and fitness events in Portugal.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 14, Martinique
programme.desc: This stage is in Martinique and eight strongmen from all over the world will compete for the last chance to gather points before the world grand finals in December.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E15 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 15, Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: A special World championship under the newcomers and lightweights in the Strongman world. Some of them will step from this to the heavyweights divisions.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S02 : E16 SCL 2015 Season 2, Episode 16, World Finals Turkey
programme.desc: After 15 outstanding competitions all over the world, finally we are here at the final competition of this year’s Strongman Champions League hosted in Turkey.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 1, Norway - World strongest Viking
programme.desc: Welcome to the land of Vikings - Norway - to the first stage of the SCL World Series 2016

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: The second stage of the SCL heads to the FIBO convention, Cologne. The leading international trade show for fitness, wellness and health hosts.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 3, Lithuania - Log lift World championship
programme.desc: For the third stage of SCL world series 2016, the athletes compete in Kaunas for the SCL Log Lift World Championships.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: Stage four is an epic competition and a few surprises. With 14 strongmen from all over the world, one newcomer left quite an impression.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 5, Latvia
programme.desc: This year Lauri Nami joins the starting list, back after last year's injury in Romania

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 6, Serbia
programme.desc: The SCL train stopped in Zlatibor for the stage 6 of the MLO SCL. 11 compete for the title in the home country of legendary Ervin Katona.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 7, Bulgaria
programme.desc: Bulgaria hosts the next stage of the SCL. Current leader in the World Series is Matjaz Belsak, youngest competitor and strongest man of Slovenia.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 8, England
programme.desc: The competitors battle it out in the special event, the Atlas Steel Stone. This stone is made completely from iron and cannot be touched with any support.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 9, Finland
programme.desc: This stage sees the strongmen visit Vaasa, Finland. Residents here are familiar with the competition because some of the SCL icons are from their country.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 10, Finland - World championship under 105 kilograms
programme.desc: 38 athletes compete in the under 90kg and under 105kg SCL World Championships. From each weight class, the top 12 qualify for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 11, Romania Part 1
programme.desc: A two day, seven event battle with lots of spectators.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 12, Romania Part 2
programme.desc: Alex Moonen is leading. Part two of the competition in Romania showcases a new challenge - Hercules Hold.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 13, Curacao
programme.desc: In this stage in Curacao no one wants to lose the chance to fight for one kilo gold in World grand finals in Dubai.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 14, Portugal
programme.desc: The last chance to qualify for the World Grand Finale. Zageris and Belsak fight for the better position for the finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 15, Dubai World grand finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: We reach Dubai where we will crown the new champion for SCL 2016. This is part one of the world finals.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 SCL 2016 Season 3, Episode 16, Dubai World grand finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this last episode, the best athletes compete in Pole Push, Deadlift, Forward Hold and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 1, Norway
programme.desc: We are in beautiful Norway for the kick off of the 2017 MLO Strongman Champions League season. With partly cloudy weather and lots of snow, we have the perfect scenery for the athletes, who prepare for the first contest of the year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 2, Germany
programme.desc: A definite highlight in this FIBO edition in Germany, Strongman Champions League introduced its new rules for a special team item. Graham Hicks tries here to set a New World Record on the biggest log in the world, currently held by Krzysztof Radzikowski. Boosted also by the presence of the acclaimed in the strongman circles names of Mark Felix and Danis Zageris.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 3, Lithuania
programme.desc: This weekend sees the Strongman Champions League Log Lift World Championships in Lithuania. Big lifting names such as Graham Hicks , Vidas Blekaitis and Vytatus Lalas are in the startlist to push some big numbers.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 4, Holland
programme.desc: The battle of the Dutch will take place this edition in Lichtenvoorde, a place very well known in Holland because of the famous “Black Cross”. The athletes will compete over six heavy events and the winner gets 25 Strongman Champions League ranking points.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 5, Serbia
programme.desc: Set in the beautiful mountain resort Zlatibor, the fifth stage of the Strongman Champions League 2017 sees 14 athletes from across the world competing for the gold medal of SCL Serbia 2017. The event welcomes top-athlete - and odds-on favourite - Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia), who has presented himself in an impressive shape so far. Can his opponents defeat him?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 6, Canada (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next two stages take place in Quebec. With eight events over two days, SCL Canada is a true ‘heavyweight’. The athletes compete in: Truck Pull, Deadlift with cars, Log Lift, and the Atlas Stones. The World’s Strongest Viking Jean-Francois Caron from Canada is a favourite, as well as current SCL leader Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and promising underdog Jimmy Paquet (Canada).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 7, Canada (Part 2)
programme.desc: Welcome to the second day in Quebec. The athletes are fighting hard to win this two-day event. The last points of this SCL stage can be won over four outstanding disciplines: Power Stairs, Dumbbell Press, Keg Toss, and finally, the legendary Farmer’s Walk. Who will leave Canada with the yellow ‘Leader Shirt’?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 8, Finland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stages 8 and 9 of the SCL are hosted in Vaasa, Finland, taking place over a spectacular two-day event. After 3 wins so far, Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia plans to extend his lead at the top of the table. Among the other 13 highly motivated strongmen, two SCL legends will make their comeback to the competition: Former World Champion of 2015, Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland) and Dainis Zageris (Latvia).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 9, Finland (Part 2)
programme.desc: The fight for the Finnish trophy continues. In this unmissable SCL event, the strongmen battle for the win in the Carry and Drag, the Forward Hold, Deadlifting with Cars and the Loading Race. Belsak, Radzikowski and Zageris look good after the first day, but the others haven’t given up yet.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 10, Finland Lightweight World Championship
programme.desc: This under 105kg category event is the ultimate preparation for up-and-coming strongman athletes before entering the heavy class. The Lightweight World Championship is a special every year in the SCL calendar as it sees new talents rise and many promising athletes who are gearing up for future tournaments. A total of 25 athletes from 16 different countries make their way to Kokkola, Finland

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 11, Romania
programme.desc: Situated in the very heart of the Carpathian Mountains, Sibiu is a Romanian town where the climate is pleasantly mild, offering some of the best weather conditions for a strongman event around Europe. All this, without doubt, set the mood for the high results and showtime vibes in Stage 11 of Strongman Champions League. The competition in Sibiu was organized in six different disciplines

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E12 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 12, Curacao
programme.desc: From now on every stage of these series will be more than crucial. Curacao is a beautiful Dutch island in the Caribbean, with a great atmosphere to hold another stage of the MLO Strongman Champions League. Let’s see who takes the title here and who will secure a place in the next stage.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 13, Jordan
programme.desc: Ten of the world’s strongest men gathered in Amman to compete in Jordan’s first-ever Truck-Pull Championship. The contestants race against the clock while pulling a 21-ton truck across the track. One of the most fierce competitors to take part in the event was four-time winner of the World’s Strongest Man competition, Brian Shaw.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E14 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 14, Greece
programme.desc: Taking place in Corinth, Greece, considered by many the cradle of the sports competition games, an epic strongman battle will mark the last stage before the upcoming big two-day season’s finale in Chetumal, Mexico. In front of more than 5000 spectators, the twelve athletes compete in Log Lifts, Card Deadlift, Conan’s Wheel and Loading.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E15 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 15, Mexico World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first day of the two-part finale sees the strongest men competing in Carry and Drag, Dumbbell Lift and the Truck Pull. Everything is possible in this heated fight for the crown against the backdrop of stunning Chetumal, Mexico.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S04 : E16 SCL 2017 Season 4, Episode 16, Mexico World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: On the second day of the grand finale of the 2017 Strongman Champions League, the athletes have a last chance to secure the medals in the spectacular four events Weight for Height, Deadlift Cars, Forward Hold and The Loading Medley. Be prepared for stunning performances – and even world records!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 1, Norway - World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: Season 2018 begins with 14 strongest men in the world, all competing for the title. The competition kicks off in Norway. We’ll see typical Viking disciplines, team events and world records in heavy conditions in the land of snow and ice. They will suffer, they will freeze and fight in this first competition of the year for the title that they will carry on their shoulders throughout whole year.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 2, Germany - FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capichampions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2018 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 3, Abu Dhabi
programme.desc: For the first time in history, Strongman Champions League will set up competition in Abu Dhabi. The line-up of super athletes, who are part of the SCL, includes former world champions Dainis Zageris (Latvia) & Krzysztof Radzikowski (Poland), current world champion Matjaz Belsak (Slovenia) and biggest strongman in the World Sean O’Hagan (Ireland).

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Strongman classic in land where there is no place for anything else excepts strength, fight and endurance. Here are fourteen of the strongest men, fighting for the title of strongest in Holland.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 5, Holland (Part 2)
programme.desc: We go back to Holland, where former champion Dainis Zageris is in leading position after the first three events. Alongside Radzikowski, he is in this moment favorite for world title, and also leader shirt holder.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 6, Finland
programme.desc: Stage six of Strongman champions league, 2018 is set back on north, in Finland. Here we have Matjaz Belsak, wearing SCL leader shirt, one of the biggest strongman in the World Mika Torro, fan favorite strongman in all over the World – Will Baggott, and also big name from Baltic – Aivars Smaukstelis

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 7, Serbia
programme.desc: Twelve strongman, including defending Worldchampion Matjaz Belsak from Slovenia , will compete on “Air spa” for the title of best in homeland country of Tesla, Pupin, Novak Djokovic. Matjaz Belsak is the SCL leader in this competition, chasing his third victory this season.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 8, Finland - U105 (Part 1)
programme.desc: The World championship in lightweights of the Strongman Champions League bring to us 50 strongmen from all over the world. All athletes are under 105 kilograms and for them this is the step up to the ultimate heavyweights.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E09 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 9, Finland - U105 (Part 2)
programme.desc: In this second stage of the World championship of lightweights we will find out who out of the 12 athletes will win the title in the under 105 kilogram category.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 10, Romania (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of SCL Romania 2018 will be hosted in Brasov. This episode features a new event for Strongman Champion League: “ The Chopper Pull”!

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 11, Romania (Part 2)
programme.desc: After three classical Strongman events – Dead lift, Loading and Front hold – and one historical, Chopper Pull for the first time in history of Strongman, now we go to find out who will take title in Romania. This is the second stage in Romania and it remains to be seen who will win the title; Aivars, Travis or Krzyzstof?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 12, Curacao (Part 1)
programme.desc: The next destination of Strongman Champions League is in a piece of paradise on earth – Curacao. We bring to you some special Strongman events like the Rock Lift, Tug of War and Weight for Height in this episode.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 13, Curacao (Part 2)
programme.desc: This is the last competition before the grand finals. After the first three events Zageris is in top place, but can O’Hagan, Baggott, Petursson and Ortmayer step into the final? Last chance some of them will find through events like Forward Hold, Truck Pull, Dead Lift and loading very big objects.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E14 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 14, Road to Mexico
programme.desc: We bring you 50 minutes of Strongman inside. Fears, inspiration, courage, the best and worst from our finalists and their expectation of the finals. We also go to Poland and Germany to represent one day in the training of Krzysztof Radzikowski and Dennis Kohlruss. See all the finalists for Mexico in their comfort zone here, with their backgrounds /motivations /family and friends.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E15 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 15, Mexico - World Finals (Part 1)
programme.desc: The first part of the Strongman Champions League 2018 finals in Mexico. The last twelve athletes all pushing their boundaries and testing their limits to take the World title.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S05 : E16 SCL 2018 Season 5, Episode 16, Mexico - World Finals (Part 2)
programme.desc: After 11 months and 14 competitions all over the world, it all comes down to the final in this episode. The strongmen must show their best skills and every mistake is expensive, so their concentration must be at the highest possible level. Will Krzysztof manage to take off back or will Dainis maintain his lead?

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 1, World Strongest Viking
programme.desc: This year 14 athletes from all over the world came to Fefor to compete in 6 cruel events. We'll see typical Viking disciplines on very heavy conditions in land of snow and ice, World records and athletes like the title defender Krzysztof Radzikowski, strongest guys from Holland and Germany and many more

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 SCL S6 Ep2 FIBO Power
programme.desc: The next stop in strongest league of the world is muscle capital, largest number of strong shoulders per capita in the World and of course, the most powerful host in Strongman champions league on the planet. It’s a FIBO - the biggest expo on planet Earth and the second stage of 2019 Strongman champions league, in Cologne, Germany.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 3, Turkey
programme.desc: On a spectacular beach in Alanya, the MLO Strongman Champions League Turkey was viewed by thousands of spectators over a two day battle. With 12 athletes at the start over 6 cruel events, like Marble Stone Lift, Truckpull and Deadlift cars. And with the comeback of Travis Ortmayer / USA, former stone king and world ranked competitor. Winner of several SCL stages in the past.

programme.title: Strongman Champions League
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 SCL 2019 Season 6, Episode 4, Holland (Part 1)
programme.desc: Four times Strongest Man of Holland, Alex Moonen and the “Flying Dutchman” Kelvin de Ruiter competing here in Holland against 12 other strongest men in the world. There were 6 events in total, and 3 in this episode: The first event, a truckpull of 17.000 kg over 25 meters in max 75 seconds, was a real hard pull Also for the World Champion Truckpull, Holland’s runner-up Kelvin de Ruiter, but watch his amazing technique here.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix 2024
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 GLORY 2 Brussels
programme.desc: From the Forest National in Brussels, Belgium on October 6, 2012. This event featured a super fight between Remy Bonjasky and Anderson Silva as headliner, Also this event featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E09 COLLISION 7
programme.desc: In the main event, ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven put his GLORY world heavyweight title on the line against number one contender ‘The Prince’ Levi Rigters in a hotly anticipated rematch from their GLORY Grand Prix final earlier this year. GLORY light heavyweight world champion Tarik Khbabez will collide with Donegi Abena in a trilogy fight to end their heated rivalry in the co-main event.

programme.title: Nothing But Bangers
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Nothing But Bangers Episode 1
programme.desc: 2 hours of nothing but great knockouts and exciting fights.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 GLORY 2 Brussels
programme.desc: From the Forest National in Brussels, Belgium on October 6, 2012. This event featured a super fight between Remy Bonjasky and Anderson Silva as headliner, Also this event featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E09 COLLISION 7
programme.desc: In the main event, ‘The King of Kickboxing’ Rico Verhoeven put his GLORY world heavyweight title on the line against number one contender ‘The Prince’ Levi Rigters in a hotly anticipated rematch from their GLORY Grand Prix final earlier this year. GLORY light heavyweight world champion Tarik Khbabez will collide with Donegi Abena in a trilogy fight to end their heated rivalry in the co-main event.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 GLORY 3 Rome
programme.desc: From the PaloLottomatica in Rome, Italy on November 3, 2012. This event featured the Glory 70kg Slam Tournament final 8 Quarter Finals, Semifinals and Final. Albert Kraus withdrew from the tournament due to the flu and was replaced by Yoshihiro Sato.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 GLORY 36 SuperFight Series
programme.desc: GLORY 36 SuperFight Series is headlined by Congolese-German light heavyweight Danyo Ilunga throwing down with the Netherlands' Michael Duut. Armenian-Belgian power puncher Harut Grigorian battles 23-year-old German prospect Danijel Solaja at welterweight in the can't miss co-headline bout. Plus two Super Bantamweight Grand Prix bouts. Muay Thai champion and MMA star Tiffany van Soest meets Canadian challenger Jessica Gladstone in one semifinal match-up, while 21-year-old Dutch prospect Isis Verbeek takes on undefeated Amel Dehby of France. The winners of each semifinal match-up will advance to the Grand Prix tournament final – the opening bout of GLORY: COLLISION.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 GLORY 36 Oberhausen
programme.desc: The Lightweight title is on the line as Sittichai looks to defend his title against #1 challenger Marat Grigorian. There is also a four-man lightweight tournament on the card.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 GLORY COLLISION
programme.desc: It's the fight everyone wants to see as GLORY Heavyweight champion, Rico Verhoeven takes on Badr Hari. Plus, the Welterweight title is on the line as Nieky Holzken meets Cedric Doumbé.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E10 GLORY 97 Featherweight Grand Prix
programme.desc: Eight of the best and most exciting featherweights on the planet go head-to-head in a one-night tournament. GLORY featherweight champion Petch (170-40-3, 27 KO) goes up against former RISE champion Taiju Shiratori (30-10-1, 12 KO), the in-form Berjan Peposhi (30-4, 16 KO) takes on ‘The Korean Monster’ Sunghyun Lee (69-11-2, 17 KO), the always exciting Abraham Vidales (16-3, 13 KO) collides with current RISE champ Chadd Collins (63-17-2, 32 KO), and number one ranked GLORY featherweight Miguel Trindade (59-6, 24 KO) faces RISE great & former GLORY title contender Kento Haraguchi (26-4-1, 17 KO).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 GLORY 3 Rome
programme.desc: From the PaloLottomatica in Rome, Italy on November 3, 2012. This event featured the Glory 70kg Slam Tournament final 8 Quarter Finals, Semifinals and Final. Albert Kraus withdrew from the tournament due to the flu and was replaced by Yoshihiro Sato.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 GLORY 36 SuperFight Series
programme.desc: GLORY 36 SuperFight Series is headlined by Congolese-German light heavyweight Danyo Ilunga throwing down with the Netherlands' Michael Duut. Armenian-Belgian power puncher Harut Grigorian battles 23-year-old German prospect Danijel Solaja at welterweight in the can't miss co-headline bout. Plus two Super Bantamweight Grand Prix bouts. Muay Thai champion and MMA star Tiffany van Soest meets Canadian challenger Jessica Gladstone in one semifinal match-up, while 21-year-old Dutch prospect Isis Verbeek takes on undefeated Amel Dehby of France. The winners of each semifinal match-up will advance to the Grand Prix tournament final – the opening bout of GLORY: COLLISION.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 GLORY 36 Oberhausen
programme.desc: The Lightweight title is on the line as Sittichai looks to defend his title against #1 challenger Marat Grigorian. There is also a four-man lightweight tournament on the card.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 GLORY 4 Tokyo
programme.desc: GLORY 4 Tokyo featured a one-night, single-elimination 16-man Glory Heavyweight Grand Slam Tournament. The winner brought home a $400,000 first-place prize and the runner-up a $100,000 second-place prize.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E08 GLORY 96 Rotterdam
programme.desc: A Champ vs. Champ superfight takes place in the main event as GLORY welterweight world champion Chico Kwasi (43-5, 23 KO) puts his title on the line against GLORY lightweight world champ Tyjani Beztati (27-4, 9 KO). In the co-main event, Donovan Wisse (21-1, 10 KO) aims to defend his GLORY middleweight world championship for a fifth time when he welcomes the challenge of top German Sergej Braun (44-13, 27 KO).

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E46 K1 World Grand Prix: Final 14, Osaka, 2003
programme.desc: K-1 World Grand Prix 2003 Final Elimination was a kickboxing event promoted by the K-1 organization. The event was held at the Osaka Dome in Osaka, Japan on Saturday, October 11, 2003 in front of 31,700 spectators. It was the final elimination competition for the K-1 World Grand Prix 2003, involving fourteen fighters from across the world, with all bouts being fought under K-1 Rules (100 kg/156-220 lbs). The fourteen fighters were a mixture of invitees or had qualified via previous events.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E47 K1 World Grand Prix: Finals, Tokyo, 2003
programme.desc: K-1 World Grand Prix 2003 Final was a kickboxing event promoted by the K-1 organization. The event was held at the Tokyo Dome in Tokyo, Japan on Saturday, December 6, 2003 in front of 67,320 spectators. It was the eleventh K-1 World Grand Prix final involving ten of the world's best fighters (two being reservists). The eight finalists had almost all qualified via preliminary events, while two additional fighters were invited as reserve fighters (for more detail on this see bulleted list below), with all bouts being fought under K-1 Rules (100 kg/156-220 lbs).

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 GLORY 4 Tokyo

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing

In the co-main event, Donovan Wisse (21-1, 10 KO) aims to defend his GLORY middleweight world championship for a fifth time when he welcomes the challenge of top German Sergej Braun (44-13, 27 KO).

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Ugo Okeke as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Noah Ali takes us through a day of coaching and reveals how it has impacted his day-to-day life and what he loves about being on the outside of the cage. See what it takes to prepare other fighters for a match.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT

programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S02 : E79 Mehek S2 E79
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Dream Girl

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S02 : E20 Jodha Akbar S2 E20
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Prawo Dana Candiego
programme.desc: Oparta na prawdziwych wydarzeniach, tragiczna historia uciekiniera z Saskatchewan Almighty Voice (Gordon Tootoosis), Indianina Cree, którego aresztowano za kradzież państowej własności.

programme.title: Ostatni Zabójca
programme.desc: Rodzice Ramona zostają zabici przez ludzi właściciela ziemskiego Johna Barretta. Próbując się zemścić, Ramon zostaje ranny, ale udaje mu się uratować życie Rezzy, staremu, zdesperowanemu rewolwerowcowi.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 25,26,27
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Ben i Charlie Na Dzikim Zachodzie
programme.desc: Dwóch wspólników przy użyciu forteli i oszustw, próbuje napełnić swoje puste kieszenie. Dwójka okrada bank, a następnie zmaga się z podłym i chciwym szeryfem.

programme.title: Pojedynek ranczerów
programme.desc: Amerykański western w wersji z polskim lektorem - Pojedynek ranczerów.Spór o spadek po zmarłym ranczerze przeradza się w krwawy konflikt.

programme.title: Buntowniczka
programme.desc: Ann Shelby, której rodzina jest sprzymierzona z osławionym Williamem Quantrillem, staje się banitką. Ann pragnie zemścić się na Indianinie, który zabił jej brata.

programme.title: Człowiek, Który Wołał o Zemstę
programme.desc: Weteran wojny secesyjnej doznaje amnezji po postrzale w głowę. Kiedy wraca do rodzinnego miasta, dowiaduje się, że został uznany za dezertera. Miejscowy sędzia oferuje mu szansę na oczyszczenie swojego imienia, ale chce go tylko wysłać przeciwko pewnemu niebezpiecznemu banicie i jego gangowi.

programme.title: Drań Lobo
programme.desc: Pot i jego brat Ray napadają na bank. Pot zostaje aresztowany, ale wkrótce ucieka i spotyka bandytę imieniem Steve.

programme.title: Przeżegnaj się Nieznajomy
programme.desc: Łowca nagród chce schwytać bandytę imieniem Carson, ponieważ jego gang jest wart dużo pieniędzy.

programme.title: Zabójstwo za Sto Tysięcy Dolarów
programme.desc: Łowca nagród Johnny Forest stara się spełnić prośbę umierającej matki - ma sprowadzić swojego wyjętego spod prawa brata Clinta żywego do domu.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Sabata
programme.desc: Sabata i Mangosta to rabusie. Po napadzie na bank i w wyniku serii niefortunnych wydarzeń, nawiązują współpracę z pracownikiem tegoż banku, Peterem. Rabusie uciekają, ale na ich drodze staje szef Petera i wynajęci przez niego rewolwerowcy.

programme.title: Buckaroo - Winchester Nie Wybacza
programme.desc: Gdy dyliżans, którym podróżuje niejaki Lash, zostaje zaatakowany przez gang Monteiro, Lash zabija jadącego z nim przyjaciela i wspólnika. Dlaczego? Żeby zabezpieczyć swoje bogactwo...

programme.title: Viva! Django
programme.desc: Django jest na tropie bandytów, którzy zgwałcili i zabili jego żonę.

programme.title: Komancze
programme.desc: Wspólne wysiłki rządu USA i Komanczów mające na celu wynegocjowanie traktatu pokojowego są sabotowane przez zbuntowanych Indian i krótkowzrocznego Amerykańskiego komisarza.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Durango, Płać Albo Giń
programme.desc: Windykator wplątuje się w niebezpieczną sytuację, gdy skorumpowany biznesmen, dla którego odzyskał 100 000 dolarów, nie chce mu zapłacić zwyczajowego procentu za jego usługi.

programme.title: Legenda o samotnym jeźdźcu
programme.desc: Młody Strażnik Teksasu John Reid jako jedyny przeżywa zasadzkę zorganizowaną przez przywódcę renegatów Bartholomew "Butcha" Cavendisha. Przeżyć pomaga mu stary przyjaciel z dzieciństwa Komancz Tonto. Kiedy John dojdzie do siebie i wyliże rany, poświęci życie walce z przestępczością. John Reid stanie się zamaskowanym bohaterem zachodu, Samotnym Jeźdźcem. Z pomocą Tonto dwójka bohaterów wyrusza na ratunek prezydentowi Ulyssesowi S. Grantowi, gdy Cavendish bierze go za zakładnika. Dowiadujemy się, że Cavendish był oficerem w armii Stanów Zjednoczonych, zanim stanął przed sądem wojennym i został niehonorowo zwolniony.

programme.title: Piekielny Posterunek
programme.desc: Weteran wojny w Korei próbuje pomóc właścicielowi kopalni w małym miasteczku w rozwoju kopalni wolframu, pomimo wysiłków szefa miasta, aby go powstrzymać

programme.title: Chcesz Żyć To Strzelaj!
programme.desc: Młody kowboj, Johnny, grając w sfałszowaną grę w pokera, zmuszony jest zastrzelić jednego z pozostałych graczy.

programme.title: Zachód słońca nad Kolorado
programme.desc: Ranczer pomaga przyjacielowi odzyskać odziedziczone pole, ale zostaje oskarżony o jego morderstwo.

programme.title: Jeden po Drugim
programme.desc: Na granicy Teksasu i Meksyku, podczas wojny secesyjnej, pułkownik Greyson został oskarżony o zdefraudowanie 500 000 dolarów, które miał dostarczyć dowództwu Konfederacji.

programme.title: Szalony Pies Morgan
programme.desc: Prawdziwa historia irlandzkiego banity Daniela Morgana, który jest poszukiwany, żywy lub martwy, w Australii w latach 50-tych XIX wieku.

programme.title: Compañeros!
programme.desc: Szwedzki handlarz bronią i meksykański chłop łączą siły, by uratować intelektualnego przywódcę rewolucji. W trakcie misji przytrafiają im się różne przygody.

programme.title: Rewolwer za Sto Trumien
programme.desc: Po powrocie z wojny secesyjnej Jim Slade odkrywa, że jego rodzice nie żyją na farmie.

programme.title: Niekończąca się Masakra
programme.desc: Szeryf zawieszony za nadmierną brutalność walczy ze skorumpowanymi władzami i bandytami.

programme.title: Jack Błyskawica
programme.desc: Błyskawica Jack Kane jest australijskim banitą na dzikim zachodzie. Podczas nieudanego napadu na bank bierze na zakładnika niemego Bena Doyle'a. Dwójka staje się dobrymi przyjaciółmi, z Jackiem uczącym Bena jak obrabiać banki, podczas gdy oni planują ostatni skok Jacka.

programme.title: Martwi ludzie
programme.desc: Na bezprawnym Starym Zachodzie, dwóch braci wyrusza w pełną niebezpieczeństw podróż. Ich celem jest pomszczenie śmierci ojca, ochrona plemienia Apaczów, które kochają, i odzyskanie należnych im ziem oraz złota. W trakcie wyprawy będą musieli zmierzyć się z licznymi zagrożeniami i trudnymi decyzjami, a ich więź braterska zostanie wystawiona na próbę.

programme.title: Dwie Strony Dolara
programme.desc: Nauczyciel, rewolwerowiec, były pułkownik i piękna kobieta układają plan napadu na Fort Henderson. Kiedy im się to udaje, kłopoty dopiero się zaczynają.

programme.title: Dobrze Jest Ufać... Ale Lepiej Strzelać
programme.desc: Napad nie udaje się z powodu śmierci przywódcy bandytów. Trzech rabusiów próbuje uzyskać łup. Wieść się rozchodzi i inni dołączają do walki o gotówkę.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 31, 32, 33
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Szlak do Santa Fe
programme.desc: W 1854 roku Jeb Stuart, George Custer i inni absolwenci West Point zostają oddelegowani do Kansas, aby pomóc w pacyfikacji terytorium przed wznowieniem budowy linii kolejowej do Santa Fe.

programme.title: Wielki Pojedynek
programme.desc: To klasyczny film spaghetti western z 1972 roku w reżyserii Giancarlo Santi, który wcześniej pracował jako asystent reżysera Sergio Leone przy filmach "Dobry, zły i brzydki" oraz "Pewnego razu na Zachodzie". W filmie występuje Lee Van Cleef jako szeryf, który szuka sprawiedliwości dla człowieka oskarżonego o morderstwo.

programme.title: Poker z Rewolwerami
programme.desc: Po przegraniu wszystkiego w pokera i zaciągnięciu długu, Lucas zgadza się dostarczyć wóz do miasteczka Chamaco za 5000 dolarów zapłaty. Wkrótce wpada w wielkie tarapaty z bandytami, lokalnym bossem miasta i piękną pracownicą saloonu.

programme.title: Zabójczy Dzieciak
programme.desc: Bezwzględny i okrutny kapitan Ramirez poluje na rewolucjonistów w poszukiwaniu Świętego - prawego przywódcy meksykańskiej rewolucji przeciwko Federales.

programme.title: Porachunki Rewolwerowców
programme.desc: Tajemniczy nieznajomy pojawia się, by dokonać przerażającej zemsty na byłych konfederackich oficerach, którzy podczas wojny secesyjnej zdradzili i byli odpowiedzialni za masakrę swojego oddziału.

programme.title: Dyliżans
programme.desc: Grupa podróżująca dyliżansem zbliża się do siebie z powodu zagrożenia ze strony Geronimo i przy okazji dowiaduje się więcej o sobie nawzajem.

programme.title: Wielki Skarb
programme.desc: Ślepy mężczyzna chce ukraść złoto samozwańczego gubernatora stanu Chihuahua. Nie może tego zrobić sam, więc najmuje do tego zadania czterech oszustów.

programme.title: Wielebny Colt
programme.desc: Do Tucson przybywa wielebny Miller z planem budowy kościoła. W dniu jego przyjazdu zostaje obrabowany bank. Mieszkańcy Tucson, podejrzliwi wobec nowego wielebnego, bo ten nosi przy sobie broń, natychmiast obwiniają go o napad.

programme.title: Generał Custer
programme.desc: Generał Custer - Miłość George'a Armstronga Custera do bohaterskich tradycji Kalwarii i niechęć do nadchodzącej industrializacji doprowadziły go do przeznaczenia pod Little Big Horn.

programme.title: Buntownik z Mafii
programme.desc: Przez śmiertelną pomyłkę mafijny najemnik rozpoczyna brutalną krucjatę przeciwko swojemu szefowi, jednocześnie mierząc się ze swoją przeszłością.

programme.title: Streamer
programme.desc: Odizolowany młody mężczyzna popada w obsesję na punkcie dziewczyny z kamerki internetowej, która mieszka w jego budynku. Zaprzyjaźnia się z nią, pomimo sprzecznych uczuć.

programme.title: Pocałunek Lady X
programme.desc: Zhańbiony były tajny agent ryzykuje swoje życie, a także życie swojej ragtagowej drużyny, gdy szuka zemsty na charyzmatycznym terroryście, który zabił jego żonę.

programme.title: Ukryte Piękno
programme.desc: Zderzają się światy pogrążonego w depresji psychologa i rozchwianej emocjonalnie bezdomnej kobiety. Próbując ją ratować, zakochują się w sobie, a każde z nich dostaje drugą szansę na nowe życie.

programme.title: Rajska Dolina
programme.desc: Grupa różnych ludzi chowa się w piwnicy uciekając przed śmiertelnymi skutkami ataku nuklearnego.

programme.title: Kongresmen
programme.desc: Zdeterminowany kongresmen, niezrażony polityczną zdradą, zaciekłym atakiem mediów i niedawnym rozwodem, stara się zachować godność i chronić małą wioskę rybacką przed korupcją.

programme.title: Wielka Stopa
programme.desc: Pewna rodzina wprowadza się do domku na odludziu tylko po to, by dać się sterroryzować dziwnemu, przerażającemu stworzeniu z lasu.

programme.title: Goliat i grzechy Babilonu
programme.desc: Goliat staje do walki o wolność Babilończyków, mierząc się z tyranią i zdradą. Bogata scenografia, widowiskowe sceny akcji i charyzmatyczny Mark Forest nadają filmowi wyjątkowy klimat. Zręczna reżyseria i humor w stylu dawnych epopei dodają uroku tej klasycznej produkcji peplum.

programme.title: Mój pierwszy cud
programme.desc: Film opowiada historię Angeliki, 16-letniej dziewczyny, która walczy z rzadką chorobą nowotworową - zespołem mielodysplastycznym. Film opowiada o próbie prowadzenia normalnego życia i szukaniu nadziei na znalezienie pierwszej prawdziwej miłości, zanim będzie za późno.

programme.title: Dom babci
programme.desc: Dom babci - Nastolatka i jej przyrodni bracia zostają zmuszeni do zamieszkania z babcią. Przekonują się, co znaczy prawdziwa miłość, wiara i rodzina. Wszystko to dzięki surowym zasadom narzucanym przez babcię i jej oddaniu. Jak każda rodzina tak i ta przeżywa swoje wzloty i upadki.

programme.title: Blue - Amerykański Sen
programme.desc: Gary "Blue" Meekins jest bokserem wagi średniej, który walczy o spełnienie amerykańskiego marzenia. Jednak ulice Harlemu mogą to marzenie zaprzepaścić, kiedy stary przyjaciel nakłania Garego do pomocy w napadzie na lokalnego handlarza narkotyków.

programme.title: Zerwana Umowa
programme.desc: Kiedy Maxowi, właścicielowi klubu ze striptizem, grożą lokalni gangsterzy, zwraca się on o pomoc do żony. Następnie wynajmuje płatnego zabójcę, by rozwiązać problem raz na zawsze.

programme.title: Sherlock Holmes: Pociąg do Edynburg
programme.desc: Sherlock Holmes eskortuje legendarny diament Gwiazda Rodezji pociągiem do Edynburga. Mimo zabezpieczeń, klejnot znika, a syn właścicielki zostaje zamordowany. Holmes, Watson i inspektor Lestrade ruszają tropem zbrodni, prowadzącym do pułkownika Morana – człowieka związanego z Moriartym.

programme.title: Spal Swoje Imię
programme.desc: Zmagający się z problemami muzyk wprowadza się do swojego najlepszego przyjaciela geja, aby rozpocząć na nowo swoje życie, ale zakochuje się w ich współlokatorce lesbijce.

programme.title: Stwór w Lesie
programme.desc: Trzech byłych studentów filmowych University of Delaware jedzie do Hobgood w Karolinie Północnej, aby nakręcić dokument o przetrwaniu w nadmorskich lasach.

programme.title: Zniszczenie
programme.desc: W środku nocy Donovan jedzie ze swoją dziewczyną Lucy i kilkoma przyjaciółmi na sekretne spotkanie w lesie.

programme.title: Bandyci z Beverly Hills
programme.desc: Rozwydrzony pięciolatek Byron Reed (Chris Williams) w noc poprzedzającą rodzinną wycieczkę jest niegrzeczny, więc jego matka (Natasha Alam) każe mu usiąść na karnym krzesełku. Kiedy Byron budzi się w pustym domu, zakłada, że spełniło się jego życzenie, by nie mieć rodziny.

programme.title: Wszystko o Ewie
programme.desc: Wszystko o Eve. Eva, rezolutna i powabna młoda dżokejka, przenika do stajni Pope'a Healy'ego, bogatego magnata wyścigowego.

programme.title: Bliźniacze Miasta
programme.desc: Kiedy programista komputerowy odkrywa, że jest śmiertelnie chory, musi ścigać się z czasem, aby uratować swoje małżeństwo i naprawić zmarnowane życie.

programme.title: Źli Ludzie
programme.desc: Dziwna i inteligentna czarna komedia, pełna s*xu, przemocy, brudnej polityki i sławy, BAD PEOPLE to przezabawna opowieść, która przypomina nam, że każdy z nas ma swoją ciemną stronę!

programme.title: Wojna Uczuć
programme.desc: W 1946 roku grupa niemieckich jeńców omyłkowo trafia do radzieckiego kobiecego obozu przejściowego i pod dowództwem okrutnego komendanta obozu Pawłowa musi zmierzyć się z wrogością radzieckich więźniarek i strażniczek.

programme.title: Boże Dopomóż!
programme.desc: W tej komedii o seksualnych skandalach w kościele Rain pojawiają się przerysowane osobowości i chaos.

programme.title: Wszystko w Swoim Czasie
programme.desc: Charlie rzuca pracę i przenosi się do domu, by kierować zespołem rockowym z rodzinnego miasta. Jego wspierająca dziewczyna podziela jego miłość do zespołu, aż do momentu, gdy walka w zespole zmusza ich do dokonania wyborów, które na zawsze wpłyną na ich życie.

programme.title: Wpływ
programme.desc: Influence to historia pierwszej randki dwojga autystycznych nastolatków, którzy z pomocą rodziców komunikują się głównie poprzez literowanie na tablicy literowej, która jest formą komunikacji wspomaganej.

programme.title: Pod Słońce
programme.desc: Aspirujący młody pisarz (Jackson) śledzi tytana literatury (Keitel) cierpiącego na blokadę pisarską do jego schronienia na wsi we Włoszech i uczy się o życiu i miłości od niepokornego geniusza i jego córek.

programme.title: Krwawa Gra
programme.desc: Profesjonalny zawodnik sztuk walki Ryan McGowan (Vince Segovia) rozpoczyna współpracę z policją, by walczyć z rosnącą w mieście przestępczością i coraz to brutalniejszymi bandytami.

programme.title: Znawca sztuki
programme.desc: Rodzeństwo Ken i Alice zostają wplątani w konflikt z przestępcami z Seattle, którzy chcą wykorzystać ich talent jako artystów sztuk walki.

programme.title: Pracodawca
programme.desc: Pięciu wysoko wykwalifikowanych kandydatów odbywa rozmowę kwalifikacyjną o pożądaną pracę. W noc poprzedzającą ostatnią rundę rozmów kwalifikacyjnych, wszyscy zostają porwani i odurzeni narkotykami. Następnego dnia budzą się uwięzieni razem w zamkniętym pokoju bez nadziei na ucieczkę.

programme.title: Rozmyty krąg
programme.desc: Pełnometrażowy, darmowy film w wersji z polskim lektorem - Rozmyty krąg. Film opowiada o kobiecie opłakującej stratę syna po jego zaginięciu dwa lata wcześniej. W pewnym momencie w jej życiu pojawia się tajemniczy mężczyzna z kamerą.

programme.title: Złamany
programme.desc: Zhańbiona gwiazda sportu uzależniona także od hazardu próbuje zmienić swoje życie dzięki wsparciu swojego fana numer jeden.

programme.title: Gotowi, Chętni i Zdolni
programme.desc: Samantha Martin zostaje ranna podczas jednej z misji i jest zmuszona do przejścia na emeryturę z CIA. Odkrywa, że kret w CIA współpracuje z terrorystami w celu zdobycia broni chemicznej, która ma zostać zniszczona przez rząd USA. Nie mogąc skontaktować się z CIA, tworzy zgraną grupę kolegów z CIA, aby powstrzymać terrorystów i zdemaskować nieuczciwego agenta CIA.

programme.title: Zakochana Shirin
programme.desc: Miłość nie zna granic i takie jest założenie uroczej, irańsko-amerykańskiej komedii romantycznej "Zakochana Shirin".

programme.title: Z Premedytacją
programme.desc: Czterech niezależnych filmowców zapuszcza się do małego wiejskiego miasteczka na festiwal filmowy i obiecujące spotkanie z dyrektorem filmowym. Zostają wtrąceni do więzienia za ohydną zbrodnię, a nikt nie pamięta wydarzeń z poprzedniej nocy.

programme.title: Perfekcyjny Break
programme.desc: Tytuł mistrza świata to dla Bobby'ego Stevensa najwyższa nagroda. Miał szansę dotrzeć do wielkiego finału, ale z jakiegoś powodu zamarł w walce z Rayem Carterem. Mecz skończył się prawie do zera, a Bobby nie mógł wbić do łuzy żadnej bili.

programme.title: Rodzinne Strony
programme.desc: Film przedstawia tydzień z życia pozornie przeciętnej rodziny. Harvey za wszelką cenę stara się utrzymać swój nowy biznes na powierzchni w niepewnej sytuacji gospodarczej. Crystal jest pełnoetatową mamą, która trzyma Pearl, ich 10-letnią córkę, w ryzach i zarządza obowiązkami domowymi. Kiedy Josh, kłopotliwy brat Crystal, pojawia się nie mając dokąd pójść, równowaga ich rutyny zostaje zachwiana. Ten niespodziewany dodatek do rodziny rozpoczyna serię wydarzeń, które obnażają ukryte problemy, niedoskonałości i podejrzenia, które zagrażają podstawom ich rodzinnych więzi.

programme.title: Anioły w Piasku
programme.desc: Czy Esperanza będzie w stanie pokazać Tomowi prawdę o jego przeszłości, teraźniejszości i przyszłości? Czy uda jej się uratować wszystkich młodych ludzi na świecie, którzy cierpią na depresję w okresie Bożego Narodzenia? Czy uda jej się przekonać Toma, by w pełni wykorzystał swoje życie, póki ma na to czas?

programme.title: Poznaj Hope
programme.desc: Historie miłosne dziadka pouczają mężczyznę i dziewczynę o realiach miłości.

programme.title: Ścigając Roberta Barkera
programme.desc: Fotograf- paparazzi zostaje wplątany w sfabrykowaną historię tabloidu, która ma na celu doprowadzenie do upadku znanego aktora.

programme.title: Darowany koń
programme.desc: Po stracie matki Amanda pracuje na ranczu biznesmena. Gdy jego córka odrzuca nowego konia, dziewczyna postanawia go trenować. Odkrywając talent Misty, odzyskuje nadzieję i radość.

programme.title: Żyjąc ze Zmarłym
programme.desc: Max McLean przeżywa przygody w lesie z młodym mężczyzną o imieniu Ish, który pomaga jej odnaleźć sens w samobójstwie jej chłopaka.

programme.title: 6 Niepalących
programme.desc: Dr Henry Caldwell, najlepszy mediator na świecie, staje przed największym wyzwaniem w swojej karierze, kiedy przyjmuje sześciu współlokatorów, których jedyną wspólną cechą jest to, że żaden z nich nie pali.

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An unholy alliance! Marking the feature film debut of one of Hollywoods most influential and widely referenced auteur directors, Sam Peckinpah, The Deadly Companions centers on a redemptive journey to escort a funeral procession through dangerous Indian Territory. Featuring fine work from a top-notch cast that includes the inimitable Maureen OHara at the height of her illustrious career, Peckinpahs first foray into film provides a promising glance into the energetic and violent nature of his iconic later works.

programme.title: Abilene Town
programme.desc: Ablaze with guns and guts and glory! Randolph Scott headlines as a star studded cast in this yarn about battling homesteaders. Director Edwin L. Marin (Tall in the Saddle) spins this dramatic post-Civil War tale that takes place in the legendary cow town of Abilene, Kansas, coaxing fine performances from the likes of Ann Dvorak, Edgar Buchanan, Thonda Fleming, and Lloyd Bridges. Saddle up and hang on!

programme.title: Phantom Ranger
programme.desc: Cowboy hero Tim McCoy stars as Tim Hayes, a two-fisted G-Man working for the FBI on a counterfeit money case. The incredibly daring Hayes infiltrates a gang that has kidnapped a Treasury Department engraver. Under the direction of Poverty Row icon Sam Newfield, McCoy turns in another of his legendary slam-bang performances, making Phantom Ranger a perennial favorite of B-Western fans.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: Arizona Thunderbolt
programme.desc: When Sue Bixby becomes his new boss, stagecoach robber Talbot reforms and goes after her rustled cattle. When he and his men are outnumbered fighting Lloyd's gang, Randall rides to get circus man Mahoney and his man shooting cannon.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 The Outlaw Brand
programme.desc: Looking through an old trunk, Tagg and his friend Johnny Ward, the son of a murdered lawman, find proof that his uncle is an ex-convict and may be involved in a recent bank robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E19 The Reckless Press
programme.desc: The bank is robbed and the sheriff is killed while everyone is distracted by the wedding between Sand Creeks newspaper editor and a beautiful brunette. The sheriff being the editors best man, the grief-stricken editor begins to escalate the anger towards a suspected drifter with his bias reporting. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E20 Flint and Steel
programme.desc: Annie is on the case when homesteaders are forced to sell their land for cheap due to suspicious circumstances. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E21 Tagg Oakley, Sheriff
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E22 The Waco Kid
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O' Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Gunplay
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Dude Stagecoach
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her father's killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Hard Rock Trail
programme.desc: Recently released from prison, Vic Carver, and his brother Johnny, searches for Annies Uncle Luke to enact revenge. Annie successfully gets her uncle out of town, but an angry Vic kidnaps Tagg. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Will
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Renegade Son

Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. programme.title: Captain Apache (Edited Version)
programme.desc: After Harry T. Collier, a beloved commissioner of Indian Affairs, is murdered in late March during the1880s, Captain Apache, an Indian graduate of West Point, is assigned by the army to investigate the crime. Suspecting that O.J., the sheriff of a town bordering the reservation may be involved in the killing, Apache travels there and finds the sheriff dining with his mistress Maude at the Paradise Saloon. Before Apache can question him, however, O.J. abruptly departs and rides out of town with Apache in pursuit. When Apache apprehends him, O.J. swears that he did not kill Collier and relates that the agents dying words were April Morning. Meanwhile, Griffin, a wealthy landowner and six of...

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: Riders of Destiny
programme.desc: John Wayne sings! Well, not really. His voice was dubbed here, but as Singin Sandy Saunders hes still able to write the code of justice with a blazing sixgun! Hes a government agent out to help a group of ranchers in their battle with a villain who is tying up local water rights. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Al St. John, Yakima Canutt, and Cecilia Parker, Riders of Destiny was filmed early in Waynes career it was his first for Lone Star but the unmistakable swagger is already in place!

programme.title: Adventures of Gallant Bess
programme.desc: Rather than a gorgeous Hollywood starlet, actor Cameron Mitchell (Carousel), playing cowboy Ted Daniels, shares the screen in this film with a magnificent wild horse named Gallant Bess, who he tames, trains and keeps for himself. But after Ted is gravely injured in a fixed rodeo, Bess is stolen away from him and forced to join a cruel traveling carnival in this fast-paced western from director Lew Landers (The Adventures of Rin Tin Tin).

programme.title: The Kansan
programme.desc: Richard Dix stars in this epic of the boisterous and brawling Old West! Wounded in a gun battle with the notorious James gang, John Bonniwell (Dix) wakes up in the hospital to find out hes been elected marshal! He quickly learns that this hot-headed frontier town can only be cooled off with blazing lead and dynamite! Jane Wyatt, Albert Dekker, Victor Jory, and Robert Armstrong also star in this tale of smashing fists and crashing bullets from director George Archainbaud (The Lost Squadron).

programme.title: Doomed Caravan
programme.desc: Hoppy is enlisted to help protect Jane Travers' next caravan against robbers who have been terrorizing travelers. He comes across a wily pair of thieves who hve their men disguised as soldiers to escort the caravan. Hoppy isn't fooled for a second and busts up their plan with help from the Bar 20 boys. Not to be outdone, the thieves then capture everyone but Hoppy and puts them before a firing squad. Not it's up to Hoppy to rescue his friends singlehandedly. The cast includes William Boyd as Hopalong Cassidy, with Russell Hayden and Andy Clyde as Luky Jenkins and California Jack. For those counting, this was the 32nd of 66 Hopalong Cassidy adventures. They would be edited for syndication...

programme.title: Born to Battle
programme.desc: Cyclone Tom Saunders starts a ruckus in a Chinese laundry and has to go before a judge. Unable to pay his fine, he is bailed out by a local cattle rancher and agrees to do 30 days' work for him. It's not too long before he becomes enmeshed in a war between rustlers and outlaws.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Law of the Pampas
programme.desc: Murder below the Equator...and Hopalong Cassidy races to action in the heart of the wild Pampas country !Hoppy (William Boyd) and his pal Lucky (Russell Hayden) head to South America to look after a herd of cattle sold by Cassidy's boss to an Argentine rancher. Unfortunately, the scoundrel Ralph Merritt (Sidney Blackmer) wants the cattle, and he's not above hiring some dangerous characters to do his dirty work. It's a test of blazing guns...under a blazing sun! Can the boys of Bar 20 lay down the law in a lawless place like the Pampas? Can Hoppy and his gang succeed in what is truly a last frontier? Watch and see!

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 General Delivery
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. In General Delivery, the G-men crack a government swindle. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Gypsy Traders
programme.desc: In Gypsy Traders, a band of gypsies settles down in the Montana Territory to take advantage of the copper stakes they've made in the region. In the nearby town of Bender, a group of shady locals believe the settlers should be stripped of their rights and take the matter to court. When it looks like the judge is going to rule for the gypsies, the outlaws kidnap him and lock him in the local jail.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Uncle Joe's Replacement
programme.desc: Kate hires Herby to work as an assistant manager at the hotel, causing Uncle Joe to fear for his position. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Honeymoon Hotel
programme.desc: Uncle Joe tries to advertise Shady Rest as a hotel for honeymooners.But is Hooterville really the best place for a honeymoon? Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.
